text: (Vi observ komplet rites de Hajj ‘Umrah DI. Vi prevent vi send ofert ne resume fason your har your ofert reached its destination. Vi est ill sufer kap injury vi fason your har) vi expiate per fast don charity kelk ali form de worship Dum normal Hajj vi romp sxtat de Ihraam (sanctity) inter ‘Umrah Hajj vi expiate ofert best ofer. Vi ne afford gxi vi fast 3 tag Hajj 7 when vi return hejm - this komplet 10 - Proviz vi ne viv Sankt Masjid! Vi observ DI kon ti DI est strict en enforcing retribution
